ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Rashid Mohammad has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently he is employed as an Unix/Linux Administrator at CVS Pharmacy. Rashid has extensive knowledge of AIX UNIX, Linux, Linux Red Hat, HACMP, Veritas NetBackup, Domain Name Server Protocol, Network File System, Sun Solaris, IBM WebSphere, VMware, IBM Hardware > IBM pSeries, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Veritas Volume Manager, Oracle, IBM RS6000 Hardware, HP Hardware, Dynamic Host Control protocol, DB2, Veritas Cluster, UNIX, SAN, Perl Programming, Oracle 9i, LDAP, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, HP-UX, Apache WEB Server, WebSphere MQ Portal, Tivoli/TME, Oracle 10G, NIS, MySQL, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Linux Suse, Jboss, IBM WebSphere Application Server, High Availability, WebSphere MQ, Ubuntu, Solstice DiskSuite, Sendmail, SMTP, RHEL, RDBMS, POP, Oracle Real Application Clusters, Oracle Applications, Oracle 11g, Netscape iPlanet Enterprise Application Server, Microsoft SQL Server, MQ V5.3, V6.0, Logical Volume Manager, IP, IMAP, IBM WebSphere Process Server, Hummingbird Exceed, FTP, Client/Server, BIND. So far Rashid has not gained any managerial experience.
